mapper.select: SELECT a.id 'id',a.id 'aid', a.question, a.question_type, a.teacher_category_id, a.pubdate, a.descrpt, a.option_1, a.option_1_answer, a.option_2, a.option_2_answer, a.option_3, a.option_3_answer, a.option_4, a.option_4_answer, a.option_5, a.option_5_answer, a.state, a.user_id, b.id 'bid', b.teacher_category_name, b.course_id, c.id 'cid', c.course_name from fsp_questions as a,teacher_category AS b,courses AS c WHERE a.user_id=#{id} AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id=c.id

SELECT a.id 'id',a.id 'aid', a.question, a.question_type, a.teacher_category_id, a.pubdate, a.descrpt, a.option_1, a.option_1_answer, a.option_2, a.option_2_answer, a.option_3, a.option_3_answer, a.option_4, a.option_4_answer, a.option_5, a.option_5_answer, a.state, a.user_id, b.id 'bid', b.teacher_category_name, b.course_id, c.id 'cid', c.course_name from fsp_questions as a,teacher_category AS b,courses AS c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id=c.id

SELECT a.id 'id',a.id 'aid', a.question, a.question_type, a.teacher_category_id, a.pubdate, a.descrpt, a.option_1, a.option_1_answer, a.option_2, a.option_2_answer, a.option_3, a.option_3_answer, a.option_4, a.option_4_answer, a.option_5, a.option_5_answer, a.state, a.user_id, b.id 'bid', b.teacher_category_name, b.course_id, c.id 'cid', c.course_name from fsp_questions as a,teacher_category AS b,courses AS c
AND a.user_id=#{userId}
AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id=c.id
AND a.question_type=#{questionType} AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id=c.id
AND c.id=#{courseId} AND c.id=b.course_id AND b.id=a.teacher_category_id
AND a.teacher_category_id =#{teacherCategoryID} AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id = c.id
AND a.question_type=4 AND a.teacher_category_id =1 AND a.teacher_category_id = b.id AND b.course_id = c.id
mapper.sql: id, question, question_type, teacher_category_id, pubdate, descrpt, option_1, option_1_answer, option_2, option_2_answer, option_3, option_3_answer, option_4, option_4_answer, option_5, option_5_answer, state, user_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fsp_questions
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fsp_questions (id, question, question_type, teacher_category_id, pubdate, descrpt, option_1, option_1_answer, option_2, option_2_answer, option_3, option_3_answer, option_4, option_4_answer, option_5, option_5_answer, state, user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pubdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{descrpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option1Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option2Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option3Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option4Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option5Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update fsp_questions
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question = #{record.question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_type = #{record.questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teacher_category_id = #{record.teacherCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pubdate = #{record.pubdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
descrpt = #{record.descrpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_1 = #{record.option1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_1_answer = #{record.option1Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_2 = #{record.option2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_2_answer = #{record.option2Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_3 = #{record.option3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_3_answer = #{record.option3Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_4 = #{record.option4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_4_answer = #{record.option4Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_5 = #{record.option5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_5_answer = #{record.option5Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update fsp_questions set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question = #{record.question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_type = #{record.questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_category_id = #{record.teacherCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pubdate = #{record.pubdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, descrpt = #{record.descrpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_1 = #{record.option1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_1_answer = #{record.option1Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_2 = #{record.option2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_2_answer = #{record.option2Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_3 = #{record.option3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_3_answer = #{record.option3Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_4 = #{record.option4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_4_answer = #{record.option4Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_5 = #{record.option5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_5_answer = #{record.option5Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teacher_category_id = #{teacherCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pubdate = #{pubdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
descrpt = #{descrpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_1 = #{option1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_1_answer = #{option1Answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
